transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, awaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Haan ji. Sir, maine aapke paas jaise share ki thi whatsapp pe, aapne check ki sir wo link?
Customer: Whatsapp pe?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ek minute, dekh raha hu mai.
Executive: Ek baar aap bhi dekh lijiye. To sir isme dekhiye jaise agar aapko aapki yahi lead chahiye jaise Lalganj aapki location hai, right? To aapko nearby isme chahiye. To sir aapke paas filters hote hain. Location ka filter ho gaya, category ka ho gaya, order value ho gaya, lead type ho gaya to aap filter use karke aap leads wagara consume kar sakte ho. Ya fir aap jo aapne keywords usme add kiye hain, aap keywords ko aap search karke aap wo leads consume kar sakte ho.
Customer: Whatsapp pe kuch hai hi nahi.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Whatsapp pe to kuch bheja nahi aapne.
Executive: Ek second sir, mai number bata deti hu kis number pe bheji hai maine.
Customer: Rahul dekho chutti to nahi aa gaye.
Customer: Aur Pradeep Pradeep kaha pe dene tumka?
Executive: Sir maine is number pe bheji hai.
Customer: [inaudible] yaar abhi.
Executive: Ji. Maine is number pe bheji thi 9839487909. Ye aapka hi number hai?
Customer: 9839487909. Haan ji, maine ispe aapke paas do leads aapne maine aapke paas isme share ki thi.
Executive: Dekh raha hu mai.
Executive: Haan ji. Aur sir mujhe ek cheez batani thi, sir aapke paas inquiries aati hai, ye to aap mujhe leads ka response bata rahe ho. Isme to aap sirf filter wagara use kar sakte ho jis location pe aapko chahiye hai na aur aapne isme jo keywords aapne add kiye hue hain. Keywords se aap search kar sakte ho leads wagara.
Customer: Panel dikha raha hai wo. Panel, Exide, Microtek, Luminous. To bhai ye Luminous to panel to. Abey panel, Wari, Tata. Sab panel mil jayenge panel me koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi number ye hamare isme koi message nahi hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji. Mai ye bol rahi hu ki sir ye to aapne mujhe leads ka feedback bataya hai, theek hai? But leads me aap filter use kariye usko consume kar lijiye leads ko. Inquiry ka sir kaisa kya response hai inquiry jab lead manager me jab aapke paas inquiries aati hai aap unka apne reply kiya hai unpe?
Customer: Nahi kya inquiry karna hai?
Executive: Ji. Jo sir aapke paas inquiry aayi hui hai. Theek hai? Lead manager aapke paas inquiries aati hai. Aap reply karte ho unko follow karte ho?
Customer: Nahi aati to mere paas me baat kar leta hu aisa nahi khali hu to baat kar leta hu aap kahi me mai road pe hu kahi pe travel me hu to thoda sa us samay hota hai. Otherwise mai shop pe baitha hu khali hu to fir reply karta hu baat karta hu aisa koi hai.
Executive: Nahi mai to kya hota hai na jaise aap jaise whatsapp pe reply kar rahe ho to waise aap inquiry aa rahi hai aap check kariye inquiries ko aur us pe to aap baat kar hi sakte ho jis pe aapko lag raha hai ki aapke liye relevant aayi hai waha pe aap apna catalog share kar sakte ho baat kar sakte ho na buyer ke sath.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Haan ji. Chaliye mai prayas karta hu agar koi aata hai to turant dekhne ka prayas karunga kyuki jaldi usko dekhta hu.
Executive: Sir, sir thoda sa aap active rahiye kyuki dekhiye isme aapki rating bhi bilkul zero agar aap buyer se baat kar rahe ho.
Customer: Are hamara to nuksan hai madam. Hamara to bahut nuksan hai. Hamara to kya nuksan hai. Aap log judne se koi fayda thodi hua. Sir, ek baat bataiye sir, aap agar isko use karoge, theek hai? Agar leads se feedback share karoge ki aapke liye leads relevant nahi hai to sir usme.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ji, ji madam aapki awaz saaf nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai sir awaz? Hello.
Customer: Ji. Ji, ji.
Executive: Sir mai ye bol rahi hu ki aap leads consume kariye mujhe feedback bataiye mai aapko weekly connect karti hu. Theek hai aapke paas leads aa rahi hai maine bhi jo hamari baat hui thi last time to maine aapke paas leads wagara dekh ke maine share ki thi kyuki aapne mujhe bataya tha ki mam aap aap Lalganj uske nearby areas me aap deal karte ho, right?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji, ji.
Executive: To maine aapke paas wo leads share ki thi. Theek hai? To ek baar aap wo leads dekh lijiye na please. Abhi to aapne message koi aapka aaya nahi. Aap pehle ke bheja hai abhi to koi message dikh nahi raha mujhe. Ek second, ek second sir mai dobara se bhej deti hu ek baar dekh lijiye. Ye ye dekhiye abhi aap tak aapne ab tak net on hi nahi kiya. Ye dekhiye isme jo maine abhi hello sir ka message kiya aapke paas isme aap ye do leads check kijiye aur mujhe feedback share kijiye whatsapp pe hi bata dijiye aapke liye relevant hai ya nahi hai agar relevant nahi hai to please aap us pe not relevant mark kariye aur apna feedback share kariye. Okay? Hello.
Customer: Ji, ji mai dekh raha hu.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says he has not received leads on WhatsApp.

- Customer is not actively using the platform.

- Customer says he is at a loss.



Resolution:

- Executive resent the leads on WhatsApp.

- Executive explained how to use filters.

- Executive asked the customer to share feedback.

- Executive offered weekly connection.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the leads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, whatsapp, feedback, filters, inquiries
